_instructions: Add your work experience here. Copy the experience object for each job.

experiences.description:
Owned end-to-end pipeline delivery to transform multi-source operational data into analytics-ready tables for reporting and downstream analysis.
Partnered with stakeholders to convert ambiguous questions into clear metrics and standardized dataset definitions.
Built validation checks (schema conformity, nulls, duplicates, outliers) to improve data trust and reduce recurring data issues.
Optimized SQL transformations and processing steps to improve throughput and reduce manual rework during refresh cycles.

experiences.description:
Supported ETL workflows to consolidate data from files/APIs into structured tables for reporting.
Created reusable Python scripts for cleaning, profiling, and standardizing datasets to improve consistency.
